document_data.mainbody:
Glackzana was a marilith who masqueraded as an avatar of Garagos in Chondath in 1368 DR.
Glackzana began forming a cult in Garagos name, using her powers to change her appearance to appear as the Reavers avatar. She had her followers construct a temple near the village of Gosra in the Fields of Nun in central Chondath. When Garagos learned of Glackzanas activities he appeared and destroyed the imposter, demanding that the followers rebuild the temple to a grander scale fitting for his tastes.
